DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study learn effect bipolar disorder use antimanic medication mother 's health wellbeing pregnancy first postpartum year . Infant health development also assess first year . Participation study include 7 study visit , three pregnancy four postpartum .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Bipolar Subjects : Age 18 old Pregnant 20 week Women must receive OB care Englishspeaking DSMIV diagnosis BP , subtype Inclusion Criteria nonBipolar Control Subject : Age 18 old Pregnant 20 week Englishspeaking Women must receive OB care . Women may past present subclinical Major Depressive Disorder accord DSMIV . Exclusion Criteria : Women must Active Alcohol Abuse Dependence , Active Abuse Dependence Opiates , Inhalants , Amphetamines include Ecstasy LSD , Active IV Drug Abuse , Methadone Maintenance . Women must take drug FDA category D X . Additional Exclusion Criteria Control Subjects : Women must lifetime history Bipolar Disorder antimanic drug use .
